contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Ryōnan'''|綾南町|Ryōnan-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Ayauta District, Kagawa|Ayauta District]], [[Kagawa Prefecture|Kagawa]], [[Japan]]. On March 21, 2006 Ryōnan was merged with the town of [[Ayakami, Kagawa|Ayakami]], also from [[Ayauta District, Kagawa|Ayauta District]], to form the new town of [[Ayagawa, Kagawa|Ayagawa]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 19,239 and a [[population density|density]] of 500.10 persons per km². The total area was 38.47 km². ==External links== * [http://www.town.ayagawa.kagawa.jp/ Official website of Ayagawa] {{ja icon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ryonan, Kagawa}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Kagawa Prefecture]] {{Kagawa-geo-stub}}
